mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (title, email, uploadDate, content, author_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{email}, #{uploadDate}, #{content}, #{authorId})
INSERT INTO comment (email, uploadDate, content, board_id) VALUES (#{email}, #{uploadDate}, #{content}, #{board_id})
mapper.select: SELECT idx AS idx, email AS email, title AS title, uploadDate AS uploadDate, updatedDate AS updatedDate, readCount AS readCount, imagePath AS imagePath, content AS content, author_id AS authorId FROM board

SELECT idx AS idx, email AS email, title AS title, uploadDate AS uploadDate, updatedDate AS updatedDate, readCount AS readCount, imagePath AS imagePath, content AS content, author_id AS authorId FROM board WHERE idx = #{idx}
